name: js-framework-house
description: house for building all your projects

scripts.angular: run(){ if [ -z "$1" ];           then npm run prompt; return 0; fi; if [ ! -d $1 ]; then ng new     $1; fi; cd $1; ng serve --open; }; run
scripts.cra: run(){ if [ -z "$1" ];               then npm run prompt; return 0; fi; if [ ! -d $1 ]; then npm run ch $1; fi; cd $1; npm run start;}; run
scripts.vue: run(){ if [ -z "$1" ];               then npm run prompt; return 0; fi; if [ ! -d $1 ]; then vue create $1; fi; cd $1; npm run serve;}; run
scripts.ember: npm run eh; run(){ if [ -z "$1" ]; then npm run prompt; return 0; fi; if [ ! -d $1 ]; then ember new  $1; fi; cd $1; ember serve;}; run
scripts.prompt: echo 'no arg passed ðŸ™‚,'; echo 'exiting: please provide a file name'; echo ;
scripts.eh: emberHelper() { if [ -d node_modules/ember-cli ]; then npm run fixEmber; else echo 'please run npm install ember-cli --save-dev'; fi;}; emberHelper
scripts.fixEmber: cat package.json | grep -v 'ember-cli":' > temp.json; mv temp.json package.json
